TO_CHAR(LESSON_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LESSON_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(LESSON_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LESSON_END_DATE,

ORDER BY LESSON_NO DESC
ORDER BY LESSON_NO DESC
